node.label: Color Values
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

object.script:
speed = property.getNumber("Speed")
Rup = false Gup = false Bup = false
R = 255 G = 170 B = 85
function onTick() if (R >= 255) then Rup = false elseif (R <= 0) then Rup = true
if (G >= 255) then Gup = false elseif (G <= 0) then Gup = true
if (B >= 255) then Bup = false elseif (B <= 0) then Bup = true
if (Rup) then R = R + speed else R = R - speed end
if (Bup) then B = B + speed else B = B - speed end
if (Gup) then G = G + speed else G = G - speed end
output.setNumber(1, R) output.setNumber(2, G) output.setNumber(3, B) end

c0.script:
speed = property.getNumber("Speed")
Rup = false Gup = false Bup = false
R = 255 G = 170 B = 85
function onTick() if (R >= 255) then Rup = false elseif (R <= 0) then Rup = true
if (G >= 255) then Gup = false elseif (G <= 0) then Gup = true
if (B >= 255) then Bup = false elseif (B <= 0) then Bup = true
if (Rup) then R = R + speed else R = R - speed end
if (Bup) then B = B + speed else B = B - speed end
if (Gup) then G = G + speed else G = G - speed end
output.setNumber(1, R) output.setNumber(2, G) output.setNumber(3, B) end
